com.inkapplications.preferences

Class AbsPreference<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inkapplications.preferences.AbsPreference<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanPreference, FloatPreference, IntPreference, LongPreference, StringPreference, StringSetPreference

    public abstract class AbsPreference<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract preference designed to be a convenient super class to concrete Preferences. This class handles most preference functionality.

    Subclasses are free to override the implementation and specification of any of the methods in this class as long as the general Preference contract for that method is obeyed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbsPreference

        public AbsPreference(SharedPreferences preferences,
             java.lang.String key,
             T defaultValue)
        Constructor for subclasses to call.
        Parameters:
        preferences - The SharedPreferences where the value the Preference implementation will be stored.
        key - The name of this preference.
        defaultValue - The value to return if Preference.get() is called and Preference.set(Object) has not been called. This value maybe null if the generic type the implementing subclass provides does not have a corresponding primitive.

        public boolean isSet()
        Checks if the preference is set.
        Returns:
